long_description: The Pacsafe RFIDtec 100 wallet can hold, organize and protect all your key travel documents from opportunistic RFID thieves. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Say goodbye to fumbling around at customs-with credit card slots, zippered pockets and a passport slot, important items are easily organized and handy. Pacsafe RFIDtec 100 features a transparent ID card slot, zippered pocket for cash, slip-in pocket for cash, several credit card slots and an outer zippered coin pocket.
short_description: The Pacsafe RFIDtec 100 wallet can hold, organize and protect all your key travel documents from opportunistic RFID thieves.
